name: Chrono Chromo
description:
WEBGL WARNING

The WebGL version is a bit laggy and glitchy, but does technically work. However, for the best experience, i recommend downloading the exe file

Overview

This game was made in 72 hours for the 126th mini-jam: Lost, with the restriction being "Time is a Resource." I'm fairly happy with the result, though there are definitely things I would change were I to be given more time, such as the music. Its a 2D platformer where you control time with your scroll wheel. 

Gameplay

You must navigate 8 unique levels, each with their own challenge, and retrieve all of the lost color orbs, while controlling the flow of time.

Controls

A/D - Move left/right

Space - Jump

Scroll up - Speed up time

Scroll down - Slow down time

Middle click - Reset time to normal
